Draw.definition: to compose by random selection [ a jury] 2

1.definition: to compose by random selection [ a jury]

2.definition: to take (money) from a place of deposit

3.definition: to write and sign (a draft) in due form for use in making a demand [ a check]

4.definition: to write out in due form [hired an attorney to our wills]to make a written demand for payment of money on deposit
